MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Recap of Episode 2.
I'm going to spend my day off playing "adventurer" with Kuala Lum, but the other people she has recruited are a bit shady.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuala Lum
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Come on, bring your arrows and guns~!
No one can stop the invincible Kuala Lum group~~fufufu♪
We walk in single file through the vast orchard. In adventure stories, it is a basic theory to walk in single file, without forming a formation appropriate to the situation.
Although I'm rather unwilling to be the conductor in charge of tactics in the SSS, my priority today is to let Kuala Lum do what she wants.

Since I'm assigned the role of monk, which means that I have no physical fighting ability and am placed at the tail, where I'm less likely to be targeted by the enemy, I can keep an eye on the movements of the other suspicious guys.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuala Lum
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Fufu, I really wanted to challenge an impregnable dungeon or something,
but the government says those dangerous places are off-limits.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuala Lum
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
So, we're going to explore this orchard run by an acquaintance of my
father's with his permission~. It looks like a peaceful and ordinary orchard, but don't let your guard down~!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuala Lum
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
According to the information from the guild that commissioned us,
there are ferocious monsters here. It's scary...Let's proceed with caution~

What is a guild? Is it the bar where we were drinking last night?
It was just an ordinary chain restaurant for the masses, but to Kuala Lum, it was probably a guild for adventurers.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuala Lum
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Our objective this time is to defeat the monster that is destroying the orchard.
It's a beginner's quest with a low level of difficulty, but don't underestimate it~!

The sleazebags are smirking at Kuala Lum's ass and breasts
as she talks about such things in an excited manner.
In addition, they reach out to touch her, and I quickly hold out my morning star to block them. It is a monk's weapon lent to me by Kuala Lum.

The men click their tongues and glare at me as if I'm in their way,
but I glare back at them as if to say I won't let them do what they want.
It may be a silly game that everyone in the world laughs at, but this is the dream adventure that Kuala Lum has always longed for. No one has the right to ruin it with some silly sexual harassment.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuala Lum
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Ah, everyone ready your weapons! Speak of the devil! The monster is here~!
As the men and I glare at each other in vain, Kuala Lum sounds rather pleased. Ahead of her gaze―from the shadows of fruit trees lined up at equal intervals―a strange presence pops out.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuala Lum
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Let the battle begin~! It's getting exciting~♪

The sleazebags are bewildered, wondering if there is really a monster or not,
and turn around to face it with trepidation. They are so timid that they must have been planning to run away if they were in danger anyway.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuala Lum
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
I'll make the first attack like a warrior, so cover me, okay?
I'm counting on you guys♪

After giving us a look, Kuala Lum leisurely walks up to the monster.
I observe the monster again, holding my heavy morning star at the ready.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Monster
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: "Gah, gah, gah! I'm an evil monster~! I'll rip into you all~!"
The monster, which is speaking in an indistinct accent, looks like an apple larger than a human being. Its unfocused eyeballs, which look as if they were hastily pasted on, are a little creepy.

For all intents and purposes, it is a stuffed animal.
It's hard to believe that it's a real monster. The men seem to be laughing their asses off, saying things like, "What the hell is that?"

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuala Lum
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Don't let your guard down, okay? It may look cute,
but according to the guild's information, it's a really dangerous monster.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuala Lum
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
It's a monster condensed from the resentment of apples
that have been munched on by humans for years...and it's name is Killer Apple!

"Killer Apple's gonna getcha♪ I'm coming to bite you♪
I'm red, scary, and hateful♪ Raah~ Killer Apple~♪"

Out of nowhere, a live song with a good but meaningless voice can be heard.
At the same time, heroic music begins to sound. What is this, the background music that sounds during battles in stage plays?

Could it be that this whole thing is a farce, or is someone setting this up?
The monster is fake, and there's some strange staging going on...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuala Lum
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Let's get him! We, the Kuala Lum group,
will not tolerate any evil monster destroying our orchard~! Yeah!

Kuala Lum swings her axe with force, with a look void of doubt in her face.
She looks like a young lady who couldn't kill a bug, but she is a trained SSS soldier―Her blows are fast and heavy.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuala Lum
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Oh my goodness~?

However, Killer Apple, or rather than the stuffed animal, brilliantly avoids Kuala Lum's axe slash. And even though it is just a big apple with no arms or legs, it rolls around on the ground as if taking advantage of its body shape.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuala Lum
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: ...!? Everyone, run~!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Killer Apple
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: "Stupid human!"
Killer Apple hits Don Juan with such force that he blows him away!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Killer Apple
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: "I'll make you remember the curse of the apple!"

In addition, part of the killer apple opens up like the lid of a box
and ejects countless apples from it. They hit Rob's entire body and explode!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuala Lum
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Ahh, Don Juan! Rob!?

Killer Apple flanks the stunned and fainted guys and secures them
with its bright red-colored arms. Then it rolls away at high speed.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuala Lum
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Oh my goodness! They've been kidnapped~!?

Yeah, it was a brilliant move.
The man inside that costume is probably a better trained professional than we are.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuala Lum
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Costume...? Man inside...?

Kuala Lum, apparently still unaware of the unnaturalness of the situation,
grabs my hands and pulls me in.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuala Lum
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
I don't know what's going on, but I'm going to track them down~!
I don't know much about them since we just formed a party, but they are still irreplaceable allies~!

Ah, yes. It may be an inappropriate thing to say,
but it's starting to sound like an adventure story. It's getting exciting.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuala Lum
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Oh, my gosh~ you're right! It's just like the stories I read when I was a kid~♪
While being led by Kuala Lum, who smiles innocently at me, I secretly open my free palm. There, I find a small piece of paper that Killer Apple had casually tossed to me earlier.
On the piece of paper, there is writing in a flowing script. "Please take care of my daughter. I will support you as much as possible, including eliminating insolent people."

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuala Lum
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Oh~? What are you reading, Conductor?
Maybe you found some clues or something?
I pull on her hand that I'm still holding, thinking we should hurry up and go after Killer Apple while ignoring Kuala Lum, who seems to be absorbed in the whole situation.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuala Lum
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Oh my~~♪

We both run as fast as we can through the orchard. Chasing after the hateful monster that kidnapped our precious comrades, we continue our
small-scale, not-so-world-saving but still important adventure.

It's silly, it's stupid, it's apparently in the hands of Kuala Lum's father,
who loves his daughter very much―even if it's pretended,
it's more fun to play it at all costs.
Actually, this is a very meaningful way to spend a day off.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuala Lum
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Fufu, so you're a man after all, Conductor! You're very strong and forceful.
You didn't say anything when I asked for an explanation, just clumsily pulled my hand!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuala Lum
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I have always longed to be a strong warrior. But I also longed to be a heroine who is forcibly carried around by such a warrior and protected by him.

Pulling our joined hands close and leaning toward me,
Kuala Lum smiles childishly.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Kuala Lum
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Oh, I'm so happy~
You always makes my dreams come true, Conductor~♪
